meanings.definition: A large marine mammal related to dolphins and whales.
meanings.sent1: Grampuses can be found swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a pod of grampuses while on a boat tour.
meanings.sent3: The grampuses put on a synchronized swimming show for the delighted audience.
meanings.sent4: The grampuses glided through the water like majestic sea creatures.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the grampuses breaching the surface was truly breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: There are many grampuses in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The grampuses in the exhibit caught the attention of the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The grampuses gathered for a family reunion in the deep sea.
meanings.sent4: The grampuses swam together in a playful display of unity.
meanings.sent5: The group of grampuses moved in unison, a sight to behold.
